attributes.action: speed up the process for misscarriages of justice
attributes.additional_details: justice4all has numerous cases proving this to be fact,along with websites wrote by legal teams in cases, hrappeals.com one of many to follow in this petition.
attributes.background: justice4all is a social media site on numerous uk cases waiting years for there cases to be heard in the royal court of justice,surrounding miscarriage of justice,some are waiting innocently for 10 plus years under lock and key,with the conviction secured with no probertive value of evidence.
